title: Hideyama's Studio 2
content:

{{**Hello everyone, I'm Hideyama (in [https://lol.fandom.com/wiki/OTTO_(Hou_Guo-Yu) Otto]'s voice).**}}

Here are some more fanarts. Hope everyone likes it!
